location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting legal advice on the seizing of Said Mahomed Akiil [Sayyid Muhammad Aqil].In enclosure, dispatch from J. Adam, Secretary of the Supreme Government, dated 17 September in Fort William, enclosing letter sent by E. Struttle, Advocate General at Calcutta to J. Adam, Secretary to Government Secret Department, dated 17 September, advising against the arrest of Said Mahomed Akiil, because 'it might give alarm and offence to other states and governments upon that Coast'.
